page.title: 06A MORNING AT SCHOOL
page.content: I arrive at school at{8.40 a.m.}to play cricket before school starts. I put my bag in the classroom and then go out to play. I am fourth batsman. At{9.20 a.m.}the whistle goes and we all shout "'s lines". I have never lined up to go into class but we still shout it from the days when the children used to do so. At{9.30 a.m. we go across the yard to the hall where we all assemble for{prayers.}We sing two hymns and say a lot of prayers. Then it is time to return to our class for lessons, first of all {Maths}then{Welsh}then it is {11 a.m.}and playtime.I eat my crisps and apple.After it is time for {English.}At{12.20 p.m.}we finish for dinner. I have sandwiches but some have school dinner and a few go home. Most stay in school because we have a long time for playing then.
